channel.title: [508] PuRe PkZ - !NeW! [508]
channel.description:
[size=24pt]PuRe PkZ 508 !! NeW !![/size]
[size=12pt][u]Features (TokkulScape V3.5)[/u][/size] * 100% working godwars * 95% working pots and sweets * Tons of train areas * Working jail, ban, unban, mute, unmute system! * All skills work! * Low combat training xp - makes it more interesting * Working dragonfire shield special * Quest tab teleports * Working trade * Working bank notes * Safety Dungeon Mini Game * Almost all specials work * Some what working pk point system * Working rep system * Membership rank, items, and area. * Most items require stats to wear (Those that need it)
[u]Features (Updated)[/u] * 100% working godwars + Higher and Proper Drop rate * Fixed Most Bugs and Glitches * Half Fixed Dragon Slayer Quest * Cleaned up unneeded objects and npc spawns * Fixed Commands and added a few * Much more but cant remember XD
[size=14pt][u]Pics[/u][/size] [size=12pt]Home[/size] [img]http://i917.photobucket.com/albums/ad13/mconi3/PuRePkZ.jpg[/img] [img]http://i917.photobucket.com/albums/ad13/mconi3/PuRePkZ2.jpg[/img] Teleport Tabs [img]http://i917.photobucket.com/albums/ad13/mconi3/PuRePkZ3-1.jpg[/img] Party Area ( Drop Parties ) [img]http://i917.photobucket.com/albums/ad13/mconi3/PuRePkZ4.jpg[/img]
Download Link: Media Fire - [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?2mjwmmjmhmj]http://www.mediafire.com/?2mjwmmjmhmj[/url] Will add more later!
[b][u]Credits[/u][/b] [b]Server[/b] Me - 40% for fixing Clockwise27 - 40% for already making server Bulby - 20% for Source [b]Client[/b] Who every made Client - 30% Me - 30 %For Fixing a lil Clockwise - 40% adding more models and stuff
if i aint fair with these credits then screw yu guys!
